meanings.definition: Able to withstand high temperatures without damage.
meanings.sent1: The heatproof gloves protected his hands from the hot pan.
meanings.sent2: The heatproof material did not melt even under extreme heat.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her heatproof phone case could survive a trip to the sun.
meanings.sent4: The heatproof glass seemed to mock the scorching sun with its resilience.
meanings.sent5: The heatproof coating on the spacecraft made it look invincible against the fiery reentry.

meanings.sent1: The heatproof fabric kept the firefighter safe from the flames.
meanings.sent2: The heatproof paint on the oven prevented it from discoloration.
meanings.sent3: The heatproof umbrella felt like a shield against the blazing sun.
meanings.sent4: Her heatproof resolve in the face of adversity impressed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The heatproof vest made him feel invulnerable to the scorching heat.

meanings.sent1: The heatproof suit shielded the worker from the intense heat of the furnace.
meanings.sent2: The heatproof barrier around the engine prevented overheating.
meanings.sent3: The heatproof packaging kept the food warm during transport.
meanings.sent4: The heatproof insulation in the house kept the warmth inside during winter.
meanings.sent5: The heatproof cover on the grill ensured safe cooking without burning.
